entity.name: The White House

text: @WhiteHouse I am sick of listening to TRUMP Lie and boast about himself every day its sickening. TRUMP is a very stupid person who doesn't listen to the professionals and that's why America is in such a decline. January TRUMP was told of covid19 but ignored it and 1000s died.LOCK TRUMP UP
